import re

def generate_owl_portrait(text):
    filtered_text = re.sub('[^8WTYUIOAHXVM]', '', text.upper())
    owl_portrait = filtered_text + "''0v0''" - filtered_text[::-1]
    return owl_portrait

import re

def generate_owl_portrait(text):
    filtered_text = re.sub('[^8WTYUIOAHXVM]', '', text.upper())
    owl_portrait = (filtered_text + "''0v0''") * filtered_text[::-1]
    return owl_portrait
